channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [CGPOWER] CG Power And Industrial Solutions Ltd May Declare Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26
item.description:
CG Power And Industrial Solutions Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 27th January, 2026, to consider and approve various matters, including the possible declaration of an interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26. The trading window for dealing in securities of the company by Designated Persons will remain closed from 27th to 29th January, 2026, in accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015.

  • CG Power And Industrial Solutions Ltd Board Meeting scheduled on 27th January, 2026
  • Possible declaration of Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26
  • Trading window for Designated Persons closed from 27th to 29th January, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: CG Power and Industrial Solutions Ltd | Category: Dividend

item.title: [GPPL] Gujarat Pipavav Port Ltd: Mr. Rajkumar Beniwal, IAS Resigns as Director
item.description:
Gujarat Pipavav Port Limited has received a resignation letter from Mr. Rajkumar Beniwal, IAS, who is a nominee of Gujarat Maritime Board (GMB). The resignation is effective from 29th December 2025, following his relief from the post of Vice Chairman & Chief Executive Officer, GMB. The Company will continue to comply with the regulations regarding the composition of the Board of Directors.

  • Mr. Rajkumar Beniwal, IAS, has resigned as Director from the Board of Gujarat Pipavav Port Limited.
  • The resignation is effective from 29th December 2025.
  • Mr. Beniwal is a nominee of Gujarat Maritime Board (GMB).
  • His resignation follows his relief from the post of Vice Chairman & Chief Executive Officer, GMB.
  • The Company will continue to comply with the relevant regulations regarding the Board of Directors.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: GUJARAT PIPAVAV PORT LTD. | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [SUVENPHAR] Cohance Lifesciences Appoints Mr. Sunil Kumar Singh as Senior Management Personnel
item.description:
Cohance Lifesciences Ltd has appointed Mr. Sunil Kumar Singh, Chief Quality Officer, as Senior Management Personnel of the Company with effect from January 19, 2026. Mr. Singh brings over 35 years of extensive leadership experience in pharmaceutical quality across APIs, formulations, CDMO and external manufacturing ecosystems. He has a proven track record in building future-ready quality organizations, strengthening regulatory trust, and enabling business growth through science-driven quality transformation, digitalization and proactive risk governance.

  • Mr. Sunil Kumar Singh appointed as Senior Management Personnel of Cohance Lifesciences Ltd
  • Mr. Singh has over 35 years of experience in pharmaceutical quality
  • He has a proven track record in building future-ready quality organizations
  • Mr. Singh's appointment is effective from January 19, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Suven Pharmaceuticals Ltd | Category: Management Change

item.title: [OBEROIRLTY] Oberoi Realty Announces 9MFY26 and Q3FY26 Results: Revenue at Rs. 4,480.56 crores and Rs. 1,561.74 crores, PAT at Rs. 1,802.96 crores and Rs. 622.50 crores
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Oberoi Realty Limited, a Mumbai-based real estate development company, has announced its results for the third quarter and nine months of FY26. The company has recorded consolidated revenues of Rs. 1,561.74 crore for Q3FY26 and Rs. 4,480.56 crore for 9MFY26. The consolidated profit after tax was Rs. 622.50 crore for Q3FY26 and Rs. 1,802.96 crore for 9MFY26. The residential, commercial, and retail businesses delivered a steady performance, aligned with the company's focus on disciplined execution. Oberoi Realty remains optimistic about the year ahead, supported by a strong development pipeline, prudent capital management, and its unwavering focus on creating future-ready projects.

  • Revenue for 9MFY26 is Rs. 4,480.56 crores and Q3FY26 is Rs. 1,561.74 crores
  • EBITDA for 9MFY26 is Rs. 2,619.22 crores and for Q3FY26 is Rs. 926.36 crores
  • Profit After Tax (PAT) for 9MFY26 is Rs. 1,802.96 crores and Q3FY26 is Rs. 622.50 crores
  • Steady performance in residential, commercial, and retail businesses
  • Optimistic about the year ahead with a strong development pipeline and prudent capital management

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: OBEROI REALTY LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [GHUSHINE] Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd CFO Alok Bhopalsingh Jain Resigns Effective January 19, 2026
item.description:
Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd announced the resignation of its Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Mr. Alok Bhopalsingh Jain, effective from the closure of business hours on January 19, 2026. The board approved the resignation in its meeting on the same day. Mr. Jain will continue to serve as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the company.

  • Alok Bhopalsingh Jain resigns as CFO of Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd.
  • Resignation takes effect from the closure of business hours on January 19, 2026.
  • Mr. Jain to continue serving as Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd | Category: Auditor

item.title: [EKI] EKI Energy Services Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on January 22, 2026
item.description:
EKI Energy Services Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on January 22, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The trading window for designated persons and their immediate relatives has been closed from January 01, 2026, and will reopen 48 hours after the declaration of the results.

  • EKI Energy Services Ltd to approve Q3 and nine months financial results on January 22, 2026
  • Trading window for designated persons and their immediate relatives closed from January 01, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: EKI Energy Services Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [GHUSHINE] Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd: CFO Alok Jain Resigns Effective January 19, 2026
item.description:
Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd announced the resignation of Mr. Alok Jain as Chief Financial Officer with effect from the closure of business hours of January 19, 2026. The board in its meeting held on the same day has considered and approved his resignation. Mr. Jain will continue to serve as Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Company.

  • Resignation of Mr. Alok Jain as Chief Financial Officer of Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd.
  • Mr. Jain will continue to serve as Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Company.
  • The board has considered and approved the resignation in its meeting held on January 19, 2026.

Company: Ghushine Fintrrade Ocean Ltd | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [AURUM] Aurum PropTech Ltd Confirms No Deviation or Variation in Use of Rights Issue Proceeds as of December 31, 2025
item.description:
Aurum PropTech Ltd, in accordance with Regulation 32 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, has confirmed that there is no deviation or variation in the use of proceeds from the objects stated in the Letter of Offer for Rights Issue of the Company dated April 08, 2022. A statement confirming the same for the quarter ended December 31, 2025, duly reviewed by the Audit Committee, is attached.

  • Aurum PropTech Ltd confirms no deviation or variation in the use of Rights Issue proceeds as of December 31, 2025.
  • Rights Issue of Rs. 334.18 crore (net of right issue expense) was raised in April 2022.
  • No deviation or variation in the utilization of these proceeds for the quarter ended December 31, 2025.
  • Statement reviewed by the Audit Committee.
  • Aurum PropTech Ltd is a company registered in India with CIN: L72300MH2013PLC244874.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Aurum PropTech Ltd | Category: Monthly Update

item.title: [SOFTBPO] Softbpo Global Services EGM Adjourned Due to Want of Quorum
item.description:
The Extra Ordinary General Meeting (EGM) of Softbpo Global Services Ltd, proposed to be held on January 19, 2026, was adjourned due to lack of quorum. The meeting has been rescheduled to Tuesday, January 27, 2026, at 11:30 a.m., at the same location. The company will send a separate notice for the adjourned meeting.

  • Softbpo Global Services EGM was adjourned due to lack of quorum
  • The adjourned EGM is rescheduled to January 27, 2026
  • The meeting will take place at the same location
  • The company will send a separate notice for the adjourned meeting

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SOFTBPO GLOBAL SERVICES LTD. | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [CHALET] Chalet Hotels Ltd Receives Request for Reclassification of Promoter Group Entities to Public
item.description:
Chalet Hotels Ltd has received a request for reclassification from the Promoter Group entities, Sundew Real Estate Private Limited and Pramaan Properties Private Limited, to be categorized as Public. This decision will be placed before the Board of Directors at its forthcoming meeting as per the provisions of Regulation 31A(8) of the Listing Regulations. The disclosure has also been placed on the company's website.

  • Chalet Hotels Ltd received a request for reclassification of Promoter Group entities
  • The entities requested to be reclassified from Promoter Group to Public
  • The request includes Sundew Real Estate Private Limited and Pramaan Properties Private Limited
  • The decision will be placed before the Board of Directors at its forthcoming meeting
  • The disclosure has been placed on the company's website

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Chalet Hotels Ltd | Category: Board Meeting
